text: Qiyan is a metro station on the Tamsui-Xinyi Line in Taipei, Taiwan. The station code is R21. == Station layout information == Qiyan metro station has one exit at the northern side of the station and two exits at the southern side of the station, making a total of 3 exits. The station platforms are above ground level. Platform 1 is for Tamsui or Beitou, and Platform 2 is for Xiangshan or Daan. == Around the station == * Hong-gah Museum Category:Railway stations in Taipei
title: Qiyan metro station
